mapper.select: select b.book_id, book_name, cover, author, publisher from book b inner join interest i on b.book_id = i.book_id where i.id = #{id}

select b.book_id, b.book_name, b.cover, b.author, b.publisher, r.review_no, r.rating, r.content, r.good, r.bad, r.review_reg_date from review r inner join book b on b.book_id = r.book_id inner join db_user d on r.id = d.id where d.id = #{id} order by r.review_no desc

select bb.book_id, bb.cover, bb.book_name, bb.published_date from ( select b.book_id, b.cover, b.book_name, b.published_date from user_rating_booklist u inner join book b on u.book_id = b.book_id ) bb where 49 >= rownum
